{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AMIT |model=BDW463AM |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/01/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PBLBDW463AM |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=ExpressCard/34 (USB),USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192SE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:50:18 |oui_eth=00:50:18 |default_ch= }} The FCC test report applies to the following models.. *BDW463AM (WiFi Combo VPN Router) *BWD462AM (WiFi Combo VPN Router) *CDW463AM ((WiFi Combo Router) *BDW462AM-L (WiFi Combo Security Router) *BDE460RP-001 (WiFi VPN Router)
The device is assumed to use RTL8196 like the [[D-Link DIR-410]].
Default settings are per the FCC manual and label.
